attributes.action: David Cameron to resign and call a general election
attributes.additional_details: The majority of the public did not vote for him or his government. It is time the peoples voice was heard and a FAIR & TRUE democracy established. Not the pseudo democratic dictatorship that has been engineered in times gone by and we are now stuck with
attributes.background: David Cameron apparently has no interest or respect for large sections of the community and appears to be deliberately targeting vulnerable citizens in his blatant attempt at re establishing and  reinforcing class divides for the benefit of the wealthier sections of our society

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think these petitions are similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471
and
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104416

You might like to sign these petitions instead. They are more likely to get more signatures that way.
